game.name: Tobiano
game.genres: 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 스포츠, 전략, 애니메이션과 모델링, 게임 개발
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Tobiano is a sport horse simulator with realistic genetics, management, and riding. Shop for horses and train them through the levels to succeed at shows or sell for profit. Breed horses with unique personalities and conformation. Grow your facility to add stables, farm feed, or craft tack.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tobiano is a sport horse simulator with realistic genetics, management, and riding. Shop for horses and train them through the levels to succeed at shows or sell for profit. Breed horses with unique personalities and conformation. Grow your facility to add stables, farm feed, or craft tack.
